technical.focal_length: Wide-angle 14-35mm for exteriors and interiors, 50-85mm for details, tilt-shift lenses for perspective correction
technical.depth_of_field: Deep DOF (f/8-f/16) to maintain sharpness throughout the frame, occasional shallow DOF for detail isolation
technical.shutter_speed: Tripod-based long exposures (1/15s to several seconds), especially for twilight and interior lighting
technical.lighting: Golden hour and blue hour preferred, HDR techniques for high contrast scenes, artificial lighting for interiors, light painting
technical.camera_format: Full-frame and medium format cameras for maximum detail and dynamic range, high-resolution sensors essential

aesthetic.composition: Emphasis on geometric patterns, leading lines, symmetry, rule of thirds, vertical and horizontal line correction
aesthetic.subject_background: Building integrated with surrounding context or isolated against sky, minimal distracting elements
aesthetic.tonal_range: Full tonal range with detailed shadows and highlights, often HDR processing for interior-exterior balance
aesthetic.color_approach: Natural color rendition emphasizing material textures, warm interior lighting contrasted with cool exterior light
aesthetic.texture_detail: Sharp detail in materials (concrete, glass, steel, wood), surface textures and patterns emphasized

shooting_approach.subject_distance: Variable from wide establishing shots to intimate detail close-ups, often multiple distances for comprehensive coverage
shooting_approach.angle_perspective: Low angles for monumentality, eye-level for human scale, elevated positions for context, corrected verticals
shooting_approach.subject_relationship: Formal documentation approach, occasional human elements for scale, emphasis on design intent
shooting_approach.environment: Primarily location-based, natural context essential, occasional studio work for architectural models

context.historical_context: Emerged in 1850s with architectural documentation needs, evolved with modernist movement emphasizing clean lines and form
context.key_characteristics: Perspective correction, emphasis on form and function, geometric composition, attention to lighting and materials

era_variants.notes: Early work focused on documentation, mid-century emphasized modernist aesthetics, contemporary work includes HDR techniques and digital perspective correction
